select b.b_no, b.m_no, m.m_id, b.pro_no, b.b_stock, b.b_date , p.pro_no, p.pro_name, p.m_no, m2.m_id, p.pro_stock, p.pro_price, p.pro_dc , p.pro_price - (p.pro_price / 100 * p.pro_dc) total_dc , ( p.pro_price - (p.pro_price / 100 * p.pro_dc) ) * b.b_stock total_pay , p.pro_ctnts, p.pro_view_cnt, p.pro_date , p.pro_thum_pic, p.pro_thum_path, p.pro_prdt_pic, p.pro_prdt_path
from basket b, member m, product p, member m2 where b.m_no = #{m_no} and b.m_no = m.m_no and b.pro_no = p.pro_no and p.m_no = m2.m_no order by b.b_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into basket (m_no , pro_no, b_stock, b_date) values(#{m_no}, #{pro_no}, #{b_stock}, now())
